title: Bug 17289: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: When trying to click on the first combo, it does not take focus anymore. However, if I drop down the combo list, it will take focus as expected.
OB: When clicking on the first combo, it does not take focus.
EB: The first combo should take focus when clicked on.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the 'Add a new CVS Repository' dialog.
2. Press 'Tab' to navigate and observe that the focus goes to the second combo 'Repository Path:'.
